name: Healing Potion
descr: A magical potion that restores health. Can be administered to an adjacent ally.

name: Greater Healing Potion
descr: A powerful healing potion that restores significant health.

name: Supreme Healing Potion
descr: An incredibly potent healing potion that can save lives.

name: Torch
descr: A simple wooden torch that provides light in dark places.

data.effect: Light up to 6 spaces, lasts 1 dungeon

name: Lantern & Oil
descr: A metal lantern with oil that provides reliable light.

data.effect: Light up to 6 spaces, lasts 1 entire outing until next Safe Rest

name: Rations
descr: Preserved food for traveling adventurers.

name: Rope (50 ft.)
descr: Sturdy rope useful for climbing and binding.

name: Chalk
descr: Useful for marking paths and leaving messages.

name: Hunting Trap
descr: A mechanical trap for catching game or hindering enemies.

name: Soap
descr: For staying clean on long adventures.

name: Manacles
descr: Iron restraints for binding prisoners.

name: Shovel
descr: Essential for digging and burying.

name: Bell
descr: A small bell that can signal or alert.

name: Instrument
descr: A musical instrument for performances and entertainment.

name: Mirror
descr: A small hand mirror, useful for looking around corners.

name: Strange Plant
descr: An unusual plant with mysterious properties.

name: Backpack
descr: Essential for carrying gear and supplies.

name: Bedroll
descr: A portable sleeping mat for resting in the wild.

name: Waterskin
descr: A leather container for carrying water.

name: Tinderbox
descr: For starting fires.
